data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith-Vaniz, William F. (2016): Opistognathus ensiferus, a new species of jawfish (Opistognathidae) from the Gulf of Mannar, India, with redescription of O. solorensis Bleeker. Zootaxa 4196 (2): 278-288, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4196.2.6|29 occurrences
